A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The reason for Disney to do this.- For them it's just Pure Business\, they did not care about Star Wars Legacy\, this DNA that inspire and Taught Us a Better Way to Live so you can be a better person\, this Tradition with which we grew and pass on to New Generations\, The Nature of The Force and The Jedi. They did not mind to kill all this\, for the Money involved\, they want to create \"Marvel Star Wars\" or \"Pirates of Star Wars\"\, something that Stands just for Entertain and SALE\, so\, from now on we will only see a cheap product with very low artistic quality and poor stories\, But\, Oh yeah! a Lot of money invested in Special effects\, Silly Jokes and Marketing\, since they expect way more money in return. So\, In Our Words\, Sadly \"The Dark Side Has Won...\"
